About Me¶


I was born and raised in Tunisia. I grew up in a small town near Monastir. Since an early age I had a passion for breaking down toys and trying to figure them out. My first code lines were in pascal in high-school, which I graduated with honor and was granted a scholarship for engineering studies in Germany. Since 2013 I live in Munich (Germany) and study electrical engineering at the Technical University of Munich. I’m a big fan of sports, and very interested in programming and cyber-culture.
